books.author: Barack Obama
books.description: In the first volume of his presidential memoirs, Barack Obama offers personal reflections on his formative years and pivotal moments through his first term. Read by the author. 29 hours, 10 minutes unabridged.
books.title: A PROMISED LAND

books.author: Adam Grant
books.description: An examination of the cognitive skills of rethinking and unlearning that could be used to adapt to a rapidly changing world. Read by the author. 6 hours, 40 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THINK AGAIN

books.author: Isabel Wilkerson
books.description: The Pulitzer Prize-winning journalist reveals a rigid hierarchy in America today. Read by Robin Miles. 14 hours, 26 minutes unabridged.
books.title: CASTE

books.author: Bill Gates
books.description: A prescription for what business, governments and individuals can do to work toward zero emissions. Read by Wil Wheaton and the author. 7 hours, 11 minutes unabridged.
books.title: HOW TO AVOID A CLIMATE DISASTER

books.author: Cicely Tyson with Michelle Burford
books.contributor: by Cicely Tyson with Michelle Burford
books.description: The late iconic actress describes how she worked to change perceptions of Black women through her career choices. Read by Cicely Tyson, Viola Davis and Robin Miles. 16 hours, 9 minutes unabridged.
books.title: JUST AS I AM

books.author: edited  Ibram X. Kendi and Keisha N. Blain
books.contributor: edited by Ibram X. Kendi and Keisha N. Blain
books.contributor_note: edited by Ibram X. Kendi and Keisha N. Blain
books.description: A compendium featuring 90 writers covering 400 years of African-American history. Read by a full cast. 14 hours, 2 minutes unabridged.
books.title: FOUR HUNDRED SOULS

books.author: Glennon Doyle
books.description: The activist and public speaker describes her journey of listening to her inner voice. Read by the author. 8 hours, 22 minutes unabridged.
books.title: UNTAMED

books.author: Michelle Obama
books.description: The former first lady describes how she balanced work, family and her husband’s political ascent. Read by the author. 19 hours, 3 minutes unabridged.
books.title: BECOMING

books.author: Heather McGhee
books.description: The chair of the board of the racial justice organization Color of Change analyzes the impact of racism on the economy. Read by the author. 11 hours, 8 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE SUM OF US

books.author: Jocko Willink and Leif Babin
books.contributor: by Jocko Willink and Leif Babin
books.description: Applying the principles of Navy SEALs leadership training to any organization. Read by the authors. 8 hours, 15 minutes unabridged.
books.title: EXTREME OWNERSHIP

books.author: Malcolm Gladwell
books.description: Famous examples of miscommunication serve as the backdrop to explain potential conflicts. Read by the author. 8 hours, 42 minutes unabridged.
books.title: TALKING TO STRANGERS

books.author: Trevor Noah
books.description: A memoir about growing up in South Africa by the host of “The Daily Show.” Read by the author. 8 hours, 50 minutes unabridged.
books.title: BORN A CRIME

books.author: Andy Ngo
books.description: A former writer for the online magazine Quillette gives his perspective on the activist movement antifa. Read by Cecil Harold. 9 hours unabridged.
books.title: UNMASKED

books.author: Yuval Noah Harari
books.description: How Homo sapiens became Earth’s dominant species. Read by Derek Perkins. 15 hours, 17 minutes unabridged.
books.title: SAPIENS

books.author: Bill Gates
books.title: HOW TO AVOID A CLIMATE DISASTER

books.author: Jocko Willink and Leif Babin
books.contributor: by Jocko Willink and Leif Babin
books.title: EXTREME OWNERSHIP

books.author: Ramit Sethi
books.title: I WILL TEACH YOU TO BE RICH, SECOND EDITION

books.author: Dav Pilkey
books.description: Stories within a story come to life as Li'l Petey, Flippy and Molly show baby frogs how to create comics.
books.title: CAT KID COMIC CLUB

books.author: Ann M. Martin.
books.contributor: by Ann M. Martin. Illustrated by Gabriela Epstein
books.description: The ninth book in the Baby-sitters Club series. Claudia must choose between spending time with the very artistic Ashley or the Baby-sitters Club.
books.title: CLAUDIA AND THE NEW GIRL

books.author: Dav Pilkey
books.description: The ninth book in the Dog Man series. After turning in his badge, the canine cop is determined not to just roll over.
books.title: GRIME AND PUNISHMENT

books.author: Catana Chetwynd
books.description: Humorous and authentic moments within intimate relationships.
books.title: IN LOVE & PAJAMAS

books.author: Tui T. Sutherland.
books.contributor: by Tui T. Sutherland. Illustrated by Mike Holmes
books.description: The fourth book in the Wings of Fire series. Starflight discovers NightWings have imprisoned several innocent RainWings.
books.title: THE DARK SECRET

books.author: Dav Pilkey
books.description: The eighth book in the Dog Man series. Petey the Cat feels better after getting out of jail but Li’l Petey struggles to find good in the world.
books.title: FETCH-22

books.author: Jerry Craft
books.description: Jordan Banks, an artistically inclined seventh grader from Washington Heights, has a tough time navigating an upscale private school where diversity is low and maintaining his neighborhood friendships.
books.title: NEW KID

books.author: Dav Pilkey
books.description: The seventh book in the Dog Man series. A new villain has a bone to pick with Dog Man while Petey the Cat starts a new life.
books.title: FOR WHOM THE BALL ROLLS

books.author: Dav Pilkey
books.description: The sixth book in the Dog Man series. When he is wrongly sent to the pound, Dog Man’s friends try to prove his innocence.
books.title: BRAWL OF THE WILD

books.author: Kohei Horikoshi
books.description: Will Izuku Midoriya's chance encounter with a superhero change his fate? Most likely!

books.contributor: by Scott Cawthon and Kira Breed-Wrisley. Illustrated by Claudia Aguirre

books.title: THE TWISTED ONES

books.description: The fifth book in the Dog Man series. The villainous cat Petey becomes an unlikely ally.
books.title: LORD OF THE FLEAS

books.contributor: by Ann M. Martin. Illustrated by Gale Galligan
books.description: The eighth book in the Baby-sitters Club series. Mary Anne isn’t sure where her friendship might go with the boy who has a Southern accent.
books.title: LOGAN LIKES MARY ANNE!

books.description: The seventh book in the Hilo series. Can Gina, DJ and Hilo protect magical beings in jeopardy?

books.contributor: by Kaiu Shirai. Illustrated by Posuka Demizu
books.description: Kids at the Grace Field House orphanage learn the dark truth of the outside world they are not allowed to see.
books.title: THE PROMISED NEVERLAND, VOL. 1

books.author: Julia Quinn
books.description: The second book in the Bridgerton series. Kate Sheffield gets in the way of Anthony Bridgerton's intent to marry.
books.title: THE VISCOUNT WHO LOVED ME

books.author: Julia Quinn
books.description: The first book in the Bridgerton series. Daphne Bridgerton’s reputation soars when she colludes with the Duke of Hastings. The basis of the Netflix series “Bridgerton.”
books.title: THE DUKE AND I

books.author: Danielle Steel
books.description: An affair wrecks a marriage and a daughter seeks to get out from her family’s shadow while old dreams and new love are pursued.
books.title: THE NUMBERS GAME

books.author: Christine Feehan
books.description: The fifth book in the Torpedo Ink series. One of the motorcycle club’s members needs a second chance after thinking an intimate encounter was just a dream.

books.author: Julia Quinn
books.description: The third book in the Bridgerton series. Sophie Beckett spends time in the arms of Benedict Bridgerton during a masquerade ball.

books.author: James Patterson and Andrew Holmes
books.contributor: by James Patterson and Andrew Holmes
books.description: A former member of the British Special Air Service looks into the death of a young woman in London at her parents' urging.
books.title: REVENGE

books.author: David Baldacci
books.description: When Atlee Pine returns to her hometown to investigate her sister’s kidnapping from 30 years ago, she winds up tracking a potential serial killer.
books.title: A MINUTE TO MIDNIGHT

books.author: Susan Wiggs
books.description: Natalie Harper takes over the care of her mother’s bookshop and her ailing grandfather.
books.title: THE LOST AND FOUND BOOKSHOP

books.description: The fourth book in the Bridgerton series. Penelope Featherington and Colin Bridgerton discover each other's secrets.
books.title: ROMANCING MISTER BRIDGERTON

books.author: Julia Quinn
books.description: The fifth book in the Bridgerton series. Eloise Bridgerton confounds a brutish gentleman’s expectations.
books.title: TO SIR PHILLIP, WITH LOVE

books.author: C.J. Box
books.description: The 20th book in the Joe Pickett series. A grizzly bear attack and an attempted assassination of a local judge baffle the Wyoming game warden.

books.author: Lynsay Sands
books.description: The ninth book in the Highland Brides series. After escaping an English dungeon, Lady Elysande de Valance is escorted to the Highlands by the rugged Rory Buchanan.
books.title: HIGHLAND TREASURE

books.author: RaeAnne Thayne
books.description: When her estranged mother becomes injured, Olivia Harper returns with her daughter to Cape Sanctuary and their secrets come to light.
books.title: THE SEA GLASS COTTAGE

books.author: J.D. Robb
books.description: The 51st book of the In Death series. A hitman with possible connections to Eve Dallas’s husband is seen near the scene of a crime.
books.title: SHADOWS IN DEATH

books.author: Julia Quinn
books.description: The sixth book in the Bridgerton series. Will things between Francesca Bridgerton and Michael Stirling grow into something more or will she marry his cousin?
